projects.title: webApp
projects.description: Project to digitise the Watizat association's guides. The application allows you to consult the guides, filter them by category, and edit the data (backoffice). The guides are also geolocated on a map. The application is responsive and works on mobile phones and tablets

projects.title: Migrappi
projects.description:
Reconstruction of an application for collecting and processing data on exiled persons received, on behalf of the NGO Caritas in Morocco. 

 Modelling the interface and building the front end before handing over to a service provider

projects.title: My resume
projects.description: Rebuilding my CV online, as an alternative to Linkedin, and portfolio of different projects

projects.title: Currencies converter
projects.description: Conversion and historical exchange rate display application. The application is responsive and works on desktop, mobile and tablet devices

projects.title: Todolist
projects.description: Building a to-do list management application. The application is responsive and works on mobile and tablet devices
